RIP Uncle V.  An indirect Covid victim. He never tested positive but the quarantine of his LTC home caused him great anxiety which caused the stroke that took his life today.  My dad’s only sibling, my only connection to my Grandpa. I’ll miss him and am sad.  🙏🏼
